title: Tablet-Based Integrated Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and basic tablet operation skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on real-life problem-solving skills through cross-curricular activities.

learning_goals: Solve math problems linked to three or more academic disciplines using tablet-based apps
Improve procedural knowledge application skills by 30% using interactive tablet features
Explain mathematical concepts through diverse representations (visual/verbal) via collaborative activities in digital environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
